page.title: 04EDUCATION
page.content: EDUCATION There are no Schools within the area. There was a village School at High Offley but it was closed in 1980, and the School and School House now stand empty. The local children attend the First School in Woodseaves, the Middle School in Gnosall and Com -prehensive High Schools in Stafford. This demands early morning travel for children of nine who have to travel from Weston Jones to Gnosall. The travellng usually puts two hours on the School day. A few children attend private Schools in Stafford, Stone or Brewood. There are a number of University students whose families live locally and they attend Universities all over the country. The very young children have a Play Group which meets once a week in the Village Hall.
